text: Juliet Mills (born 21 November 1941) is an English actress who has performed in movies, television and stage acts since 1942. She played in the supernatural NBC soap opera Passions. She also performed in other television shows. ==Family== She is the elder daughter of John Mills and Mary Hayley Bell. Her sister is Hayley Mills. She has a son by her first husband and a daughter by her second husband. Her current husband is Maxwell Caulfield. title: Juliet Mills
